DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, non-interventional study to evaluate efficacy and safety in rheumatoid arthritis participants receiving tocilizumab as per the product label.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of RoActemra (Tocilizumab) in Participants With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Participants with rheumatoid arthritis receiving tocilizumab as per product label No specific exclusion criteria were specified for this noninterventional trial
